effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.
flavor_text.emerald: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is blasted with a blizzard. It may freeze the foe solid.
